Combat

Bespell Strikes: (F) Casting a non-cantrip spell causes a wielded weapon to inflict +1d6 HP until the end of the turn once per turn; the damage type is force or the same type as the spell inflicted

Magic
Spell Slots: A1: 4; A2: 4; A3: 4; A4: 4; A5: 4; AC1: 5 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Arcane: +18 (intelligence; expert) Spell DC: Arcane: 28 (intelligence; expert)
Spells:
Acid Grip (A2): (2) R120' Inflicts 2d8 HP acid, 1d6 HP persistent acid, and -10' Speed (save Reflex inflicts half initial HP only and moves the target 5'; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double initial HP and moves the target 20') (heightened +2 inflicts +2d8 HP initial and +1d6 HP persistent)
Aerial Form (A4): (2) Self becomes a Medium bat, bird, pterosaur, or wasp with 5 temporary HP, Armor Class 28, +16 attack, +5 damage, low-light vision, flight, +16 Acrobatics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 5th becomes a Large creature with +10' Speed, 10 temporary HP, +18 attack, +8 damage, +20 Acrobatics; 6th becomes a Huge creature with +15' Speed, 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 31, +21 attack, +4 damage with double damage dice, +23 Acrobatics)
Air Bubble (A1): (R) R60' Allows target to breathe normally in any environment for 1 min
Alarm (A1): (10 min) 20' burst triggers a mental or audible alarm when a Small or larger corporeal creature enters without saying a specified password for 8 hr (heightened 3rd allows specifying characteristics of triggering creatures)
Animated Assault (A2): (2) R120' Loose objects in a 10' burst inflict 2d10 HP bludgeoning initially and 1d10 HP bludgeoning on subsequent rd while sustained for up to 1 min (save basic Reflex) (heightened +2 inflicts +2d10 HP initially and +1d10 HP when sustained)
Ant Haul (A1): (2) Touched can carry +3 Bulk without encumbrance and +6 Bulk maximum for 8 hr
Aqueous Orb (A3): (2) R60' 10' sphere extinguishes normal fires, attempts to counteract magical fires, and engulfs Large or smaller creatures until they succeed on an Escape or DC 10 Swim check (save Reflex negates; critical failure disallows Swim) while sustained for up to 1 min
Arctic Rift (A8): (2) R120' Inflicts 12d8 HP cold and slowed 1 for 1 rd (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and slowed 1 until ice with 60 HP and Hardness 5 is cleared) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d8 HP and gives ice +5 HP)
Banishment (A5): (2) R30' Returns the target to its home plane (save Will (-2 if cast using an additional action and a target anathema) negates; critical success inflicts stunned 1 on self; critical failure prevents the target's return for 1 week) (heightened 9th affects 10 targets)
Bestial Curse (A4): (2) Touched suffers clumsy 1, requires a successful DC 5 flat check for manipulate actions, and gains a claw, hoof, horn, or jaws Strike for 1 hr (save Fortitude only inflicts clumsy 1 for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure effects are permanent)
Bind Undead (A3): (2) R30' Controls the actions of a mindless undead of level less than or equal to the spell level for 1 day
Blazing Bolt (A2): (1) R60' Spell attack inflicts 2d6 HP fire, or double on a critical success; using 2 or 3 actions increases the damage to 4d6 HP fire and attacks 2 or 3 targets (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP, or +2d6 HP with 2 or 3 actions)
Blindness (A3): (2) R30' Blinds the target for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last until next turn; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent blindness)
Blister (A5): (2) R60' Allows self to create 2 15' cones from target that each inflict 7d6 HP acid (save basic Fortitude) anytime within 1 min (save Fortitude allows 1 cone; critical success negates; critical failure allows 4 cones)
Blistering Invective (AC1): (2) Allows self voice to be heard up to 500' away, giving +1 Coerce and auditory Perform in large venues (heightened 5th extends voice to 1200'; 7th extends voice to 1 mile)
Blood Vendetta (A2): (R) R30' Spell attack inflicts 2d6 HP persistent bleed and weakness 1 to piercing and slashing on a target that has inflicted piercing, slashing, or persistent bleed on self (save Will inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP) (heightened +2 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Blur (A2): (2) Touched becomes concealed for 1 min
Breathe Fire (A1): (2) 15' cone inflicts 2d6 HP fire (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Carryall (A1): (2) Creates an invisible 2' radius disk that follows self and holds 5 Bulk for 8 hr (heightened 4th allows carrying passengers and 10 Bulk
Cataclysm (A10): (2) R1000' 60' burst inflicts 3d10 HP each acid, bludgeoning 3 times, cold, electricity, and fire, ignoring resistance 10 (save basic Reflex)
Caustic Blast (AC1): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts 1d6 HP acid, plus 1 HP persistent acid on a critical success, and 1 HP acid splash (heightened 3rd inflicts 1d6+4 HP initial and 2 HP persistent; 5th inflicts 2d6+4 HP initial, 3 HP persistent, and 2 HP splash; 7th inflicts 3d6+4 HP initial, 4 HP persistent, and 3 HP splash; 9th inflicts 4d6+4 HP initial, 5 HP persistent, and 4 HP splash)
Chain Lightning (A6): (2) R500' Inflicts 8d12 HP electricity on a chain of targets, jumping up to 30' between each (save basic Reflex; critical success ends the chain) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP)
Charitable Urge (A2): (2) R30' Compels the target to give a possession to the nearest creature (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure effects last for 4 rd or until a successful save)
Charm (A1): (2) R30' Target becomes friendly, or helpful if already friendly, and cannot use hostile actions against self for 1 hr (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure makes the target helpful) (heightened 4th effects last until next daily prep; heightened 8th effects last until next daily prep and affect 10 targets)
Chilling Spray (A1): (2) 15' code inflicts 2d4 HP cold and -5' Speed for 2 rd (save Reflex inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and -10' Speed)
Clairaudience (A3): (1 min) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to listen from the target location for 10 min
Clairvoyance (A4): (1 min) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to see from the target location for 10 min
Cloak Of Colors (A5): (2) R30' Creatures adjacent to the target suffer dazzled, and successful attackers suffer blinded for 1 rd (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts stunned for 1 rd), for 1 min
Command (A1): (2) R30' Target obeys a command to approach, run away, drop a held object, drop prone, or stand in place for 1 action (save Will negates; critical failure causes the target to use all actions on its next turn to obey) (heightened 5th affects 10 targets)
Confusion (A4): (2) R30' Inflicts confused for 1 min or until a successful save (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure allows no further save attempts) (heightened 8th affects 10 targets)
Contingency (A7): (10 min) Prepares a spell of up to 3 actions and 4th level to activate as a reaction to a specified trigger (heightened 8th allows a 5th level spell; 9th allows a 6th level spell; 10th allows a 7th level spell)
Control Water (A5): (2) R500' Raises or lowers water by 10' and slows water creatures for 1 hr (save Fortitude negates) in a 50'x50' area
Cozy Cabin (A3): (1 min) R30' Creates a 20'x20'x10' comfortable wooden cabin for 12 hr or until self exits
Create Food (A2): (1 hr) R30' Creates food for 6 Medium creatures that lasts for 1 day (heightened 4th creates food for 12; 6th creates food for 50; 8th creates food for 200)
Create Water (A1): (2) Creates 2 gallons of water that last for 1 day
Creation (A4): (1 min) R0' Creates an object of up to 5 cubic feet made of earth or vegetable matter that lasts for 1 hr (heightened 5th object can include metal and common minerals)
Cursed Metamorphosis (A6): (2) R30' Transforms the target's form into a harmless animal for 1 min, allowing a new save to revert each rd (save Will inflicts minor physical changes and sickened 1; critical success negates; critical failure transforms permanently and also affects the target's mind)
Darkvision (A2): (2) Allows self to see in darkness for 1 hr (heightened 3rd affects a touched target; 5th effects last until next daily prep)
Daze (AC1): (2) R60' Inflicts 1d6 HP mental (save basic Will; critical failure also inflicts stunned 1) (heightened +2 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Deafness (A2): (2) R30' Inflicts deafness for 10 min (save Fortitude effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent deafness)
Desiccate (A8): (2) Targets in a 500' radius suffer 10d10 HP void (save basic Fortitude; plant and water creatures worsen save by 1 degree) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP)
Detect Magic (AC1): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-level illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the rank of the highest-level effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the highest-level effect)
Detect Scrying (A4): (2) 30' emanation reveals scrying effects, along with the scrying creature for lower-level effects, for 1 hr (heightened 6th effects last until next daily prep)
Detonate Magic (A9): (2) R120' Makes a counteract check to convert the target magic into an explosion that inflicts 8d6 HP force (save basic Reflex)
Disappearance (A8): (2) Touched becomes undetectable by any sense for 10 min
Disguise Magic (A1): (1 min) Alters the magical aura of the target object, making it appear as non-magical, as a common magical item of up to twice the spell level, or as under the effects of a spell of up to the spell level, until next daily prep (heightened 2nd can affect a creature or all of its possessions)
Disintegrate (A6): (2) R120' Spell attack inflicts 12d10 HP, reducing the target to dust at 0 HP, or destroys a non-artifact 10' cube object (save basic Fortitude; critical hit worsens save by 1 degree) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d10 HP)
Dispel Magic (A2): (2) R120' Makes a counteract check to remove 1 spell effect from the target or to make a magic item inert for 10 min
Dispelling Globe (A4): (2) 10' burst attempts to counteract outside spells at the spell level - 1 for 10 min
Dizzying Colors (A1): (2) 15' cone inflicts stunned 1, blinded for 1 rd, and dazzled for 1 min (save Will inflicts dazzled for 1 rd only; critical success negates; critical failure extends blindness to 1 min)
Dominate (A6): (2) R30' Self controls the actions of the target until next daily prep; a successful save at end of each turn ends the spell (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure allows further saves only upon repugnant orders) (heightened 10th effects are permanent)
Dragon Form (A6): (2) Self becomes a Large dragon with 40' Speed, 100' fly Speed, 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 28, +22 attack, +6 damage, a breath weapon, resistance 10 to the breath weapon damage type, darkvision, 60' imprecise scent, +23 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 8th becomes a Huge creature with 120' fly Speed, +5' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 31, +28 attack, +12 damage (breath weapon +14), +28 Athletics)
Dream Message (A3): (10 min) Self sends 1 min of speech to a familiar creature, received the next time they sleep (heightened 4th sends speech to 10 familiar creatures)
Duplicate Foe (A7): (3) R30' Creates a minion copy of a target up to level 15 with 70 HP and no special abilities while sustained for up to 1 min or until reduced to 0 HP; the copy loses 4d6 HP after each turn (save Fortitude the copy inflicts half HP and lasts 2 rd; critical success negates) (heightened +1 increases the target level that can be copied by 2 and the copy HP by 10)
Earthbind (A3): (2) R120' Brings a flying target to the ground and prevents flight and levitation for 1 rd (save Fortitude grounds target but does not prevent flight; critical success negates; critical failure effects last for 1 min)
Earthquake (A8): (2) R500' 60' burst inflicts difficult terrain, -2 attacks, Armor Class, and skill checks, a 40' fall (save Reflex negates), and structure collapse that inflicts 11d6 HP bludgeoning and knocked prone (save Reflex inflicts half HP and knocked prone; critical success inflicts half HP only; critical failure causes the fall save to fail) (heightened 10th increases range to a half mile and effect area to a quarter-mile burst)
Eclipse Burst (A7): (2) R500' 60' burst attempts to counteract magical light and inflicts 8d10 HP cold, plus 8d4 HP void to living creatures (save Reflex; inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and permanent blindness) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP cold and +1d4 HP void)
Electric Arc (AC1): (2) R30' Inflicts 2d4 electricity on 1 or 2 targets (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Elemental Form (A5): (2) Self becomes a Medium elemental with 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 29, +18 attack, +9 damage, darkvision, +20 Acrobatics (air, fire, or metal) or Athletics (earth, water, or wood) modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 6th becomes a Large creature with 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 32, +23 attack, +13 damage, +23 Acrobatics or Athletics; 7th becomes a Huge creature with 15' reach, 20 temporary HP, Armor Class 32, +25 attack, +11 damage and double damage dice, and +25 Acrobatics or Athletics)
Embed Message (A2): (2) Illusory text and a disembodied voice convey a specified message of up to 25 words the next time a specified trigger occurs within 30' (heightened 4th can include additional sensory effects; 6th message can repeat multiple times)
Energy Aegis (A7): (1 min) Touched gains resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, vitality, void, and sonic damage until next daily prep (heightened 9th gives resistance 10)
Enfeeble (A1): (2) R30' Inflicts enfeebled 2 for 1 min (save Fortitude inflicts enfeebled 1 for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts enfeebled 3 for 1 min)
Enlarge (A2): (2) R30' Willing target becomes Large, gaining +5' reach, +2 melee damage, and clumsy 1 for 5 min (heightened 4th target becomes Huge, gaining +10' reach and +4 melee damage; 8th affects 10 creatures)
Entangling Flora (A2): (2) R120' 20' burst inflicts difficult terrain and -10' Speed for 1 min (save Reflex inflicts difficult terrain only; critical failure inflicts immobilized for 1 rd)
Enthrall (A3): (2) Fascinates creatures within 120' while sustained, with additional saves for disagreement (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure allows no further saves)
Environmental Endurance (A2): (10 min) Protects touched from severe cold or heat until next daily prep (heightened 3rd protects from both cold and heat; 5th protects from extreme cold and heat)
Everlight (A2): (3) Touched gemstone emits 20' bright light until dismissed
Falling Stars (A9): (2) R500' 4 meteors each inflict 6d10 HP bludgeoning in a 10' burst and 14d6 HP chosen energy in a 40' burst (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP bludgeoning and +2d6 HP chosen energy)
False Vision (A5): (10 min) Controls the image shown by scrying within a 100' burst until next daily prep
False Vitality (A2): (2) Self gains 10 temporary HP for 8 hr (heightened +1 gives +3 HP)
Fear (A1): (2) R30' Inflicts frightened 2 (save Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 rd) (heightened 3rd affects 5 targets)
Feather Fall (A1): (R) R60' Falling target slows to 60' per rd and suffers no falling damage for 1 min or until landing
Feet To Fins (A3): (2) Willing touched can swim at full Speed but slows to 5' on land for 10 min (heightened 6th effects last until next daily prep)
Fiery Body (A7): (2) Self gains fire immunity and resistance 10 to precision damage, suffers weakness 5 to cold and water, inflicts 3d6 HP fire on non-reach melee attackers, inflicts +1d4 HP fire on unarmed attacks and an additional die of damage on fire spells, can cast Ignite using 1 action as an innate spell, gains a 40' fly Speed, and does not need to breathe for 1 min (heightened 9th inflicts 4d6 HP fire on non-reach melee attackers, inflicts +2d4 HP fire on unarmed attacks, and increases fly Speed to 60')
Figment (AC1): (2) R30' Creates a simply illusory sound or vision while sustained
Fire Shield (A4): (2) Hovering shield with Hardness 10 and 40 HP gives self cold resistance 5 and immunity to severe environmental cold and inflicts 2d6 HP fire on melee attackers for 1 min (heightened +2 shield has +10 HP, gives cold resistance +5, and inflicts +1d6 HP)
Fireball (A3): (2) R500' 20' burst inflicts 6d6 HP fire (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Fleet Step (A1): (2) Self gains +30' Speed for 1 min
Flicker (A4): (2) Self gains resistance 5 to non-force damage and can use Sustain to randomly teleport 10' for 1 min (heightened +2 gives +3 resistance)
Floating Flame (A2): (2) R30' Movable flame inflicts 3d6 HP fire in a 15' sq while sustained for up to 1 min (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Fly (A4): (2) Touched gains a fly Speed of the greater of its Speed or 20' for 5 min (heightened 7th effects last for 1 hr)
Force Barrage (A1): (1) R120' 1 shard (2 or 3 actions gives 2 or 3 shards) inflicts 1d4+1 HP force (heightened +2 gives 1 additional shard per action)
Foresight (A9): (2) Touched gains +2 initiative and does not suffer off-guard vs. undetected and flanking creatures, and self may use a reaction to give the target the better of 2 rolls or its foe the worse of 2 rolls, for 1 hr
Freeze Time (A10): (3) Allows self to perform 3 rd of actions that don't affect others until the spell ends
Frostbite (AC1): (2) R60' Inflicts 2d4 HP cold (save basic Fortitude; critical failure also inflicts weakness 1 to bludgeoning for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP and weakness +1 to bludgeoning)
Gaseous Form (A4): (2) Touched becomes vapor with resistance 8 to physical damage, immunity to precision damage, proficiency modifier for unarmored defense, and 10' fly Speed for 5 min or until the target or self ends the spell
Gate (A10): (2) R120' Opens a 40' radius gate to another plane while sustained for up to 1 min
Gecko Grip (A2): (2) Touched gains a climb Speed equal to its Speed for 10 min (heightened 5th effects last for 1 hr)
Ghostly Carrier (A2): (2) R120' Creates a crawling, spectral hand that delivers touch spells for 1 min; damage to the hand ends the spell
Ghostly Weapon (A3): (2) Touched weapon becomes translucent and can affect incorporeal creatures for 5 min
Goblin Pox (A1): (2) Touched suffers stage 1 goblin pox, which inflicts sickened 1 for 1 rd; subsequent failures after 1 rd will inflict sickened 1 and slowed 1 for 1 rd at stage 2, and incurably sickened 1 for 1 dy at stage 3 (save Fortitude inflicts sickened 1 only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stage 2; goblins and goblin dogs are immune)
Gouging Claw (AC1): (2) Melee spell attack inflicts 2d6 HP slashing or piercing, plus 2 HP persistent bleed, or double both on a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP initial and +1 persistent bleed)
Grease (A1): (2) R30' 4 5' squares cause falls, or 1 target object inflicts a -2 penalty to checks, for 1 min (save Reflex or Acrobatics negates; critical failure causes the holder to drop the target object)
Grim Tendrils (A1): (2) 30' line inflicts 2d4 HP negative and 1 HP persistent bleed on living creatures (save Fortitude inflicts half HP negative only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double initial and persistent HP) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d4 HP initial and +1 HP persistent)
Gust Of Wind (A1): (2) 60' line extinguishes small, non-magical fires, disperses fog, moves light objects, and knocks prone creatures up to Large for 1 rd (save Fortitude prevents moving against the wind but does not knock prone; critical success negates; critical failure pushes 30', knocks prone, and inflicts 2d6 HP bludgeoning)
Hallucination (A5): (2) R30' Changes target's perception of an object or group for 1 hr (save Will target knows that it's hallucinating; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts -4 saves to disbelieve) (heightened 6th affects 10 targets or effects last until next daily prep; 8th affects any number of targets or effects are permanent)
Haste (A3): (2) R30' Target gains an extra Strike or Stride action each rd for 1 min (heightened 7th affects 6 targets)
Hidden Mind (A8): (2) R30' Target gains +4 saves vs. mental effects and automatic counteract attempts at the spell level + 1 vs. detection, revelation, and scrying until next daily prep
Howling Blizzard (A5): (2) 60' cone (using 3 actions gives R500' and a 30' burst) inflicts 10d6 HP cold (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Humanoid Form (A2): (2) Self becomes a Small or Medium humanoid and gains +4 Deception to pass as the chosen ancestry for 10 min (heightened 3rd gives darkvision or low-light vision if appropriate to the ancestry; 5th becomes a Large humanoid)
Hydraulic Push (A1): (2) R60' Spell attack inflicts 3d6 HP bludgeoning and a 5' push, or 6d6 HP bludgeoning and a 10' push with a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Hypnotize (A3): (2) R120' 10' burst inflicts dazzled and fascinated while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will inflicts dazzled only; critical failure inflicts loss of reactions)
Ignition (AC1): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts 2d4 HP (2d6 HP if a melee attack) fire, or double HP plus 1d4 HP persistent fire on a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP initial and persistent)
Illusory Creature (A2): (2) R500' Creates an image of a Large or smaller creature with Armor Class 28, +18 attack, 3d4 saves while sustained or until damaged; each Sustain allows directing 2 actions (heightened +1 creature inflicts +1d4 HP and can be 1 size larger)
Illusory Disguise (A1): (2) R30' Makes the target appear different and gives +4 Deception, plus the target level if untrained, to avoid uncovering the disguise for 1 hr (heightened 3rd allows copying a specific individual; 4th affects 10 targets; 7th affects 10 targets and allows copying specific individuals)
Illusory Object (A1): (2) R500' Creates an image of a stationary object in a 20' burst for 10 min (heightened 2nd effects include sounds and smells and last for 1 hr; 5th effects are permanent)
Illusory Scene (A5): (10 min) R500' Creates in a 30' burst a moving illusion with up to 10 creatures or objects, sounds, and smells for 1 hr (heightened 6th creatures in the scene can speak; 8th effects are permanent)
Impaling Spike (A5): (2) R30' Inflicts 8d6 HP piercing from cold iron and immobilized (save Reflex inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and off-guard) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Implosion (A9): (2) R30' Inflicts 75 HP on 1 target each rd while sustained for up to 1 min; a target cannot be affected twice by a single casting (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +10 HP)
Indestructibility (A10): (2) Gives self immunity to harm for 1 rd
Insect Form (A3): (2) Self becomes a Medium bug with 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 28, +13 attack, +2 damage, low-light vision, +13 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 4th becomes a Large creature with 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, +16 attack, +6 damage, +16 Athletics; 5th becomes a Huge creature with 15' reach, 20 temporary HP, +18 attack, +2 damage and double damage dice, +20 Athletics)
Interplanar Teleport (A7): (10 min) Transports self and 8 willing targets to an imprecise location on a different plane
Invisibility (A2): (2) Touched becomes invisible for 10 min; using a hostile action ends (heightened 4th effects last for 1 min, and a hostile action does not end the spell)
Invoke Spirits (A5): (2) R120' 10' burst, movable 30' per rd, inflicts 2d4 HP mental and 2d4 HP void while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure also inflicts frightened 2, plus fleeing in the first rd) (heightened +2 inflicts +1d4 HP mental and void)
Item Facade (A1): (2) Makes the target object up to a 10' cube appear decrepit or perfect for 1 hr (heightened 2nd effects last for 24 hr; 3rd effects are permanent)
Jump (A1): (1) Allows self to jump 30' immediately (heightened 3rd affects touched, and effects last for 1 min)
Knock (A2): (2) R30' Gives +4 Athletics or Thievery on attempts to open the target object for 1 min; untrained attempts by self gain an additional +10
Laughing Fit (A2): (2) R30' Inflicts slowed 1 and loss of reactions while sustained (save Will inflicts loss of reactions only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts prone for 1 rd, then slowed 1 and loss of reactions)
Levitate (A3): (2) Allows self to use concentrate actions to move the touched object or willing creature up or down 10' for 5 min
Light (AC1): (2) R120' Orb lights a 20' radius until next daily prep (heightened 4th lights a 60' radius)
Lightning Bolt (A3): (2) 120' line inflicts 4d12 HP electricity (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP)
Liminal Doorway (A4): (10 min) Drawn doorway leads to an 20' cubic extradimensional space for 8 hr or until erased
Locate (A3): (10 min) R500' Reveals the direction to a named object or the nearest object of a named type while sustained; effects are blocked by lead and running water (heightened 5th reveals the direction to a familiar creature or ancestry)
Lock (A1): (2) Touched latch or lock opens only for self until next daily prep; a successful DC 28 Athletics or Thievery check (or lock DC + 4 if higher) ends the spell (heightened 2nd effects are permanent)
Magic Passage (A5): (2) Creates a 5'x10'x10' tunnel in wood, plaster, or stone for 1 hr (heightened 7th the tunnel extends 20', appears as normal wall, and can be entered only using a password or trigger)
Mariner's Curse (A5): (2) Touched suffers incurable sickened 1, plus slowed 1 on open water, until the curse is removed (save Will inflicts curable sickened 1; critical success negates; critical success inflicts incurable sickened 2)
Marvelous Mount (A2): (10 min) R30' Conjures a magical mount (Armor Class 24, HP 10, 40' Speed) that can be ridden only by a designated creature for 8 hr (heightened 3rd mount can walk on water; 4th mount has 60' Speed; 5th mount can also fly for 1 rd; 6th mount has 80' Speed and can fly)
Mask Of Terror (A7): (2) R30' Target inflicts frightened 2 for 1 rd on attackers for 1 min (save Will negates; critical failure prevents attack) (heightened 8th affects 5 targets)
Massacre (A9): (2) 60' line inflicts 100 HP void on creatures up to level 17 and kills those reduced to 0 HP; if none die, it inflicts an additional 30 void on all within the line, including self (save Fortitude inflicts 9d6 HP; critical success negates; critical failure kills) (heightened 10th inflicts 115 HP (save Fortitude 10d6 HP) on creatures up to level 19)
Mending (A1): (10 min) Restores 5 HP per spell rank to a touched light, non-magical object (heightened 2nd can affect a 1 Bulk object; 3rd can affect a 2 Bulk or magical 1 Bulk object)
Message (AC1): (1) R120' Allows self to hold a private conversation with a visible target for 1 turn (heightened 3rd R500')
Metamorphosis (A9): (2) Replicates any known polymorph spell of up to 8th rank for 1 min
Mind Probe (A5): (1 min) R30' Self gains answers from the target, requiring a DC 28 Deception check to refuse to answer each, with critical success giving a believable false answer (save Will negates; critical failure inflicts -4 Deception)
Mind Reading (A3): (2) R30' Reveals the surface thoughts of the target and whether its intelligence is higher, lower, or equal (save Will reveals relative intelligence only; critical success allows the target to read self's surface thoughts instead; critical failure allows sustaining for up to 1 min with no further save attempts)
Mindlink (A1): (2) Telepathically transmits 10 min of information from self to touched
Mirage (A4): (10 min) R500' 50' burst illusion changes the look, sound, feel, and smell of the terrain until next daily prep (heightened 5th the illusion can mask or incorporate structures)
Mislead (A6): (2) Turns self invisible and creates an illusory duplicate while sustained for up to 1 min; a successful Deception vs. Perception can make it appear that a self action originated with the duplicate
Mist (A2): (3) R120' 20' burst conceals creatures for 1 min
Monstrosity Form (A8): (2) Self becomes a Huge phoenix, cave worm, or sea serpent with 20 temporary HP, Armor Class 30, +28 attack, darkvision, +30 Athletics modifier, and creature-specific attacks for 1 min (heightened 9th gives 25 temporary HP, Armor Class 32, +31 attack, an additional damage die, +33 Athletics)
Mountain Resilience (A4): (2) Touched gains resistance 5 to non-adamantine physical damage for 20 min; each hit reduces the duration by 1 min (heightened 6th gives resistance 10; 8th gives resistance 15; 10th gives resistance 20)
Mystic Armor (A1): (2) Self gains +1 Armor Class with a +5 maximum Dexterity modifier until next daily prep (heightened 4th also gives +1 saves; 6th gives +2 Armor Class; 8th gives +2 saves; 10th gives +3 Armor Class and saves)
Never Mind (A6): (2) R30' Inflicts stupefied 4 until the curse is removed (save Will inflicts stupefied 2 for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent animal intelligence and -5 Charisma, Intelligence, and Wisdom modifiers and changes a PC into an NPC)
Nightmare (A4): (10 min) Causes a familiar target to have nightmares and awaken fatigued (save Will inflicts nightmares only; critical success negates; critical failure also inflicts drained 2 until no longer fatigued)
Noise Blast (A2): (2) R30' 10' burst inflicts 2d10 HP sonic and deafened for 1 rd (save Fortitude inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP, deafened for 1 min, and stunned 1) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d10 HP)
Nondetection (A3): (10 min) Touched gains automatic counteract attempts vs. magical divinations for 8 hr
Oaken Resilience (A2): (2) Touched gains resistance 2 to bludgeoning and piercing and weakness 3 to fire for 10 min or until dismissed by target (heightened +2 gives +2 resistances and +3 weakness)
One With Stone (A3): (2) Self becomes a block of stone with Armor Class 23 for 8 hr or merges into stone for 10 min
Outcast's Curse (A4): (2) Touched suffers 1 step worse initial attitudes and the worse of 2 Deception, Diplomacy, Intimidation, and Performance rolls until the curse is removed (save Will effects last for 10 min; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts initial attitudes 2 steps worse)
Paralyze (A3): (2) R30' Inflicts paralyzed for 1 rd (save Will inflicts stunned 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts paralyzed for 4 rd; subsequent successful saves shorten the effects by 1 rd, and a critical success ends them) (heightened 7th affects 10 targets)
Peaceful Bubble (A4): (10 min) 100' burst around touched location blocks sensory information, scrying, and mind-reading for 24 hr; sleeping within for 8 hr reduces doomed conditions by 2
Peaceful Rest (A2): (2) Touched corpse does not decay and cannot be made undead until next daily prep (heightened 5th effects are permanent)
Pest Cache (A1): (1) Moves companion into a pocket dimension for up to 8 hr
Pest Form (A1): (2) Self becomes a Tiny animal with Armor Class 25, 20' Speed, low-light vision, 30' imprecise scent, +10 Acrobatics and Stealth modifiers, -4 Athletics modifier, and weakness 5 to physical damage for 10 min (heightened 4th becomes a creature with a 20' fly Speed)
Petrify (A6): (2) R120' Inflicts initial slowed 1; subsequent failed or successful saves each rd increase or decrease the degree slowed until the target is no longer slowed or becomes immobile and permanently turned to stone (save Fortitude inflicts slowed 1 for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts initial slowed 2)
Phantasmagoria (A9): (2) R120' Inflicts 16d6 HP mental and confused for 1 rd on all targets within range (save Will inflicts half HP loss of reactions for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and confused for 1 min)
Phantasmal Calamity (A6): (2) R500' 30' burst inflicts 11d6 HP mental (save basic Will; critical failure also inflicts stunned 1 and trapped (save Reflex negates) until a subsequent Will save each rd succeeds) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Phantasmal Minion (A1): (3) R60' Invisible servant with 4 Hit Points and a 30' fly Speed obeys commands to move and manipulate objects while sustained or until reduced to 0 HP
Pinpoint (A8): (10 min) Reveals the exact location of a specified familiar creature or object
Planar Palace (A7): (1 min) R30' Creates an entrance to a 40'x40'x30' demiplane that can be entered only by those specified, is staffed by servants, and contains provisions for up to 150 people
Planar Seal (A7): (2) R120' 60' burst attempts to counteract any teleportation or planar travel until next daily prep
Planar Tether (A4): (2) R30' Attempts to counteract any effect that would move the target to a different plane for 10 min (save Will effects last for 1 min; critical success negates; critical failure effects last for 1 hr)
Prestidigitation (AC1): (2) R10' Performs cooking, lifting, making a minor object, or tidying while sustained
Project Image (A7): (2) R30' Creates an illusory copy of self, with the same Armor Class and saves, that can be used as a source of spells while sustained for up to 1 min or until damaged (heightened +2 extends maximum sustain to 10 min)
Protective Wards (A1 Foc): (1) 5' emanation gives allies +1 Armor Class while sustained for up to 1 min; each sustain increases the radius by 5' up to 30'
Pummeling Rubble (A1): (2) 15' cone inflicts 2d4 HP bludgeon and a 5' push (save Reflex inflicts half HP only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and a 10' push) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d4 HP)
Quandary (A8): (2) R30' Transports the target to an extradimensional puzzle room while sustained or until it gains 2 solution steps; success on a Thievery, Occultism, or Perception check gives 1 step, critical success gives 2 steps, and critical failure negates any previous successes
Read Aura (AC1): (1 min) R30' Reveals whether an object is magical and gives +2 to Identify Magic on it (heightened 3rd affects 10 targets; 6th affects unlimited targets)
Remake (A10): (1 hr) R5' Fully re-creates a known object up to 5'x5'x5' from a remnant
Repulsion (A6): (2) Emanation up to 40' prevents creatures from approaching for 1 min (save Will inflicts difficult terrain; critical success negates)
Resist Energy (A2): (2) Touched gains resistance 5 vs. a specified energy type for 10 min (heightened 4th gives resistance 10 to 2 targets; 7th gives resistance 15 to 5 targets)
Retrocognition (A7): (1 min) Reveals impressions of 1 day of past events at the current location per 1 min of concentration; traumatic events require a Will save to maintain the spell (heightened 8th gives impressions of 1 year per min; 9th gives impressions of 1 century per min)
Revealing Light (A2): (2) R120' 10' burst dazzles makes concealed creatures visible and invisible creatures concealed for 1 min (save Reflex effects last 2 rd; critical success negates; critical failure effects last 10 min)
Runic Body (A1): (2) Touched creature's unarmed attack gains +1 attack and 2 damage dice for 1 min (heightened 6th gives +2 attack; 9th gives +3 attack
Runic Weapon (A1): (2) Touched weapon gains +1 attack and 2 damage dice for 1 min (heightened 6th gives +2 attack; 9th gives +3 attack
Safe Passage (A3): (3) 10'x10'x60' area gives +2 Armor Class, +2 saves, and resistance 5 to damage from the terrain and environment while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 5th gives resistance 10 and extends area to 120'; 8th gives resistance 15 and extends area to 500'
Scouting Eye (A5): (1 min) R500' Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to see from the target location and that can be moved 30' each rd while sustained
Scrying (A6): (10 min) Creates an invisible sensor that allows self to see the target creature while sustained for up to 10 min (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to glimpse self; critical failure allows the sensor to follow the target; scrying an unfamiliar target lowers the save DC by 2, and scrying an unknown target lowers it by 10)
See The Unseen (A2): (2) Self treats invisible creatures and objects as concealed for 10 min (heightened 5th effects last for 8 hr)
Sending (A5): (3) Self exchanges a pair of 25-word messages with a known creature
Shape Stone (A4): (2) Reshapes touched 10'x10'x10' stone
Shape Wood (A2): (2) Reshapes touched 20 cubic feet of wood
Shield (AC1): (1) Self gains +1 Armor Class for 1 rd; may end the spell and not use it again for 10 min to use Shield Block with Hardness 5 (heightened +2 gives Hardness +5)
Shrink (A2): (2) R30' Willing target becomes Tiny for 5 min (heightened 6th affects 10 creatures)
Sigil (AC1): (2) Inscribes a 1" sq magical mark on a touched object or creature; the mark can be scrubbed off and fades from a creature after 1 week (heightened 3rd marks a creature for 1 month; 5th marks a creature for 1 year; 7th marks a creature permanently)
Sleep (A1): (2) R30' 5' burst inflicts unconsciousness for 1 min or until a successful Perception check (save Will inflicts -1 Perception for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts unconsciousness for 1 hr or until a successful Perception check) (heightened 4th inflicts unconsciousness for 1 rd, or 1 min on a critical failure, followed by normal sleep; targets release held objects and do not wake from a successful Perception check)
Slither (A5): (3) R120' 20' bursts inflict 3d6 HP piercing, 1d6 HP persistent poison, and grabbed for 1 min; requires a successful success on a DC 28 Escape or inflicting 12 HP vs. Armor Class 28 to escape (save Reflex negates; critical failure inflicts double HP) (heightened +2 inflicts +1d6 HP persistent poison and requires +6 HP damage to escape)
Slow (A3): (2) R30' Inflicts slowed 1 for 1 min (save Fortitude effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts slowed 2) (heightened 6th affects 10 targets)
Spellwrack (A6): (2) R30' Until the curse is removed, each time the target is affected by a spell with a duration, it suffers 2d12 HP persistent force and the duration of every spell affecting it is reduced by 1 rd (save Will effects last for 1 min; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts 4d12 HP)
Spider Sting (A1): (2) Touched suffers 1d4 HP piercing and stage 1 spider venom, which inflicts 1d4 HP poison and enfeebled 1; subsequent failures after 1 rd will inflict an additional 1d4 HP poison and enfeebled 2 at stage 2 (save Fortitude inflicts 1d4 HP piercing and 1d4 HP poison only; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stage 2 immediately)
Stupefy (A2): (2) R30' Inflicts stupefied 2 for 1 min (save Will inflicts stupefied 1 for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts stupefied 3)
Subconscious Suggestion (A5): (2) R30' Specified trigger prompts the target to follow a reasonable, 1 min suggestion until next daily prep (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure inflicts following the suggestion for 1 hr) (heightened 9th affects 10 targets)
Suggestion (A4): (2) R30' Target follows a reasonable suggestion for 1 min (save Will negates; critical success allows the target to notice the attempt; critical failure effects last for 1 hr) (heightened 8th targets 10 creatures)
Summon Animal (A1): (3) R30' A level -1 animal appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 2nd summons a level 1 creature; 3rd summons a level 2 creature; 4th summons a level 3 creature; 5th summons a level 5 creature; 6th summons a level 7 creature; 7th summons a level 9 creature; 8th summons a level 11 creature; 9th summons a level 13 creature; 10th summons a level 15 creature)
Summon Construct (A1): (3) R30' A level -1 construct appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 2nd summons a level 1 creature; 3rd summons a level 2 creature; 4th summons a level 3 creature; 5th summons a level 5 creature; 6th summons a level 7 creature; 7th summons a level 9 creature; 8th summons a level 11 creature; 9th summons a level 13 creature; 10th summons a level 15 creature)
Summon Dragon (A5): (3) R30' A level 5 dragon appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 summons a +2 level creature)
Summon Elemental (A2): (3) R30' A level 1 elemental appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 3rd summons a level 2 creature; 4th summons a level 3 creature; 5th summons a level 5 creature; 6th summons a level 7 creature; 7th summons a level 9 creature; 8th summons a level 11 creature; 9th summons a level 13 creature; 10th summons a level 15 creature)
Summon Instrument (AC1): (3) Creates a handheld musical instrument that self can play for 1 hr (Heightened 5th creates a virtuoso instrument
Summon Undead (A1): (3) R30' A level -1 undead appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened 2nd summons a level 1 creature; 3rd summons a level 2 creature; 4th summons a level 3 creature; 5th summons a level 5 creature; 6th summons a level 7 creature; 7th summons a level 9 creature; 8th summons a level 11 creature; 9th summons a level 13 creature; 10th summons a level 15 creature)
Sure Strike (A1): (1) Self uses the better of 2 attack rolls, ignores concealed and hidden conditions, and ignores circumstance penalties on the next Strike in the same turn
Tailwind (A1): (2) Self gains +10' Speed for 1 hr (heightened 2nd effects last for 8 hr)
Tangle Vine (AC1): (2) R30' Spell attack inflicts -10' Speed for 1 rd, plus immobilized for 1 rd on a critical success; a successful Escape negates (heightened 2nd effects last for 2 rd; 4th effects last for 1 min)
Tangling Creepers (A6): (3) R500' 40' burst inflicts -10' Speed, and a successful unarmed attack immobilizes 1 target for 1 rd (a successful Escape negates), each rd for 10 min
Telekinetic Hand (AC1): (2) R30' Moves a light object 20' per rd while sustained (heightened 3rd moves a Bulk 1 object; 5th R60'; 7th moves a Bulk 2 object)
Telekinetic Haul (A5): (2) R120' Moves an 80 Bulk, 20' cubic object 20' each rd while sustained for up to 1 min
Telekinetic Maneuver (A2): (2) R60' Spell attack attempts to Disarm, Shove, or Trip
Telekinetic Projectile (AC1): (2) Spell attack hurls a loose object that inflicts 1d6+4 HP of the appropriate damage type, or double HP on a critical success (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Telepathy (A4): (2) Allows self to communicate telepathically with any creature in a 30' radius for 10 min (heightened 6th allows communication with creatures without a shared language)
Teleport (A6): (10 min) Transports self and 4 willing touched creatures or objects up to 100 miles to a point near a specified known location (heightened 7th transports 1000 miles; 8th transports anywhere on the same planet; 9th transports to any planet in the same system; 10th transports to any planet in the same galaxy)
Thunderstrike (A1): (2) R120' Inflicts 1d12 HP electricity and 1d4 HP sonic (save basic Reflex; targets in metal armor suffer -1 save and clumsy 1 for 1 rd (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP electricity and +1d4 HP sonic)
Toxic Cloud (A5): (3) R120' Creates a cloud in a 20' burst that inflicts 6d8 HP poison and moves away 10' each rd for 1 min (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d8 HP)
Translate (A2): (2) R30' Target understands a chosen heard language for 1 hr (heightened 3rd the target can also speak the language; 4th affects 10 targets)
Translocate (A4): (2) Teleports self to a visible location within 120' (heightened 5th allows teleporting to a familiar location within 1 mile)
True Target (A7): (1) R60' Allies' attacks within 1 rd on a designated creature use the better of 2 attack rolls and ignore circumstance penalties and concealed and hidden conditions
Truesight (A6): (2) R60' Makes counteract checks to allow self to see through illusions and transmutations for 10 min
Truespeech (A5): (2) Target understands and speaks all languages for 1 hr (heightened 7th effects last for 8 hr)
Umbral Journey (A5): (1 min) Allows self and 10 willing touched to travel through the Netherworld at 72x Speed for 8 hr
Uncontrollable Dance (A8): (2) Touched suffers off-guard and no reactions for 1 min and spends 2 actions each turn dancing (save Will effects last for 3 rd and the target spends 1 action each turn dancing; critical success negates; critical failure effects last for 1 min and the target spends all actions each turn dancing)
Unfettered Movement (A4): (2) Relieves touched of Speed penalty effects and gives automatic success on Escape attempts vs. non-magical effects and magical effects up to the spell level for 10 min
Unrelenting Observation (A8): (2) R100' 5 targets in a 20' burst can see a 6th target for 1 hr; lead and running water block the vision (save Will effects last for 1 min; critical success negates)
Vampiric Exsanguination (A6): (2) 30' cone inflicts 12d6 HP void, giving self temporary HP for 1 min equal to half that suffered by the most-affected target (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Vampiric Feast (A3): (2) Touch inflicts 6d6 HP void, giving self temporary HP for 1 min equal to half the inflicted damage (save basic Fortitude) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Veil Of Privacy (A3): (10 min) Attempts to counteract detection, revelation, and scrying cast against the target for 8 hr
Ventriloquism (A1): (2) Allows self to project their voice up to 60' for 10 min (heightened 2nd effects last for 1 hr, allow changing voice quality, and require an active Perception to attempt to disbelieve)
Vibrant Pattern (A6): (2) R120' 10' burst dazzles and blinds creatures while sustained for up to 1 min; a successful save each rd after leaving the area removes the blindness (save Will inflicts dazzled only; critical failure blinds for 1 min with no further saves)
Vision Of Death (A4): (2) R120' Inflicts 8d6 HP mental, frightened 2, and death if taken to 0 HP (save Will inflicts half HP, frightened 1, and death at 0 HP; critical success negates; critical failure double HP, frightened 4, death at 0 HP, and fleeing until no longer frightened) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Void Warp (AC1): (2) Touch inflicts 2d4 HP negative on a living creature (save basic Fortitude; critical failure also inflicts enfeebled 1 for 1 rd) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP)
Wall Of Fire (A4): (3) R120' 5'x60'x10' line or 10' radius ring inflicts 4d6 HP fire for 1 min (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Wall Of Force (A6): (3) R30' Creates an invisible 50'x20' wall with Armor Class 10, Harness 30, and 60 HP that blocks physical effects and corporeal, incorporeal, and ethereal creatures for 1 min (heightened +2 gives +20 HP)
Wall Of Ice (A5): (3) R120' Creates a 60'x10'x1' wall or a 10' radius hemisphere of opaque ice with Armor Class 10, Hardness 10, weakness to fire 15, and 40 HP per 10' section for 1 min; rubble from destruction inflicts 2d6 HP cold and difficult terrain (heightened +2 each section gains +10 HP, and rubble inflicts +1d6 HP)
Wall Of Stone (A5): (3) R120' Creates a permanent 120'x20'x1" stone wall with Armor Class 10, Hardness 14, and 50 HP per 10' section; rubble from destruction inflicts difficult terrain (heightened +2 each section gains +15 HP)
Wall Of Thorns (A3): (3) R60' Creates a 60'x10'x5' bramble wall with Armor Class 10, Hardness 10, and 20 HP per 10' section that inflicts difficult terrain and 3d4 HP piercing for 1 min (heightened +1 inflicts +1d4 HP, and each section gains +5 HP)
Wall Of Wind (A3): (3) R120' Creates a 60'x30'x5' wind wall that blocks small ammunition, inflicts -2 attack on larger ammunition, inflicts difficult terrain, and blocks flying creatures for 1 min (save Fortitude (flying creature) allows passage as difficult terrain; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts a 10' push)
Warp Mind (A7): (2) R120' Inflicts confused for 1 min (save Will inflicts confused for 1 action; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts permanent confusion)
Water Breathing (A2): (1 min) R30' 5 targets can breathe water for 1 hr (heightened 3rd effects last for 8 hr; 4th effects last until next daily prep)
Water Walk (A2): (2) Touched can walk on liquids for 10 min (heightened 4th R30' affects 10 creatures, and effects last for 1 hr)
Wave Of Despair (A5): (2) 30' cone prevents reactions, and failure on a second save inflicts slowed 1, for 1 min (save Will effects last for 1 rd; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts slowed 1 for 1 min with no second save) (heightened 7th affects a 60' cone)
Weapon Storm (A4): (2) Weapon swing inflicts 4 dice of damage to every creature in a 30' cone or a 10' emanation (save Reflex inflicts half HP; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts double HP and critical specialization effect) (heightened +1 inflicts +1 damage die)
Magic Notes:
Arcane School: Has a focus pool
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Arcane)
School Of Ars Grammatica: +1 spell slot each rank/Knows the Protective Wards arcane spell
Counterspell: (R) Expends a spell slot to attempt to counteract a spell with the same spell
Drain Bonded Item: (F) Can cast an expended spell using power stored in a possession once per day
Experimental Spellshaping: Can choose 1 spellshape feat of up to level 5 to use each day during daily prep
Reach Spell: (1) Extends subsequent spell range by 30'
Spell Protection Array: (1) R30' 5' burst gives +1 saves vs. magic while sustained for up to 1 min
Split Slot: Can cast either of 2 prepared spells from a slot up to rank 4
Steady Spellcasting: Can negate spellcasting disruption with successful DC 15 flat check
Widen Spell: (1) Increases the effect of a subsequent 10' or greater radius area instantaneous spell by 5', the effect of a 15' or shorter line or cone instantaneous spell by 5', or the effect of a longer line or cone instantaneous spell by 10'
Wizard Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the arcane tradition
